alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 16 at 2:41AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
